title.rendered: Level Up Your Internship Preparation with Emily

content.rendered:
You secured an internship — now, what’s next? Hear from Emily Glaister, Campus Recruiting Lead, EMEA, about how to prepare.

  • Set Goals
    • Determine what you want to achieve from your internship experience; you get out as much as you put in.
  • Prepare
    • Connect with your manager to understand what you can do to prepare before the program starts, such as reading about industry trends and understanding what project work you’ll be aligned to.
  • Be Curious
    • Ask questions and challenge yourself by seeking out new information and stepping out of what is comfortable.
  • Understand Expectations
    • Ask your manager what you can do to exceed expectations and have a successful summer at Millennium.
